BEID_Certificate be::belgium::eid::BEID_Certificate::getChildren ( uint  ulIndex  )  [inline]

Return the children certificate (certificate that has been issued by this one).

Throw BEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range.

Parameters:
ulIndex is the children index (the index for the first child is 0
)
